replies.msg: She's invited to a marathon next month but she might be out of condition to compete. During the First World War, the Japanese government granted her grandfather asylum. Recently, her cousins Tom and Jerry have been accused of robbery. If convicted they would be thrown in jail for two years. The judge granted bail to Tom but refused to grant Jerry bail. Tom's parents agreed to stand bail for him who's now remanded on bail for forty four thousand one hundred and eighty dollars whereas Jerry is remanded in custody for twelve days. Her maid has been stealing money from her. After an investigation she said "She's been stealing money. I'll grant you that" Her best friend will be coming from Seoul so she's gonna have her around for a few nights. I said "having her over for a few nights is fair enough but you should let your family know before having her over" My brother too said "I grant that it's very kind of you to have her over but you should let your family know beforehand"
